definitions.definition: The process or act of reuniting.
examples: The reunion took forever, but it was worth it.
It was a tearful and heartfelt reunion as the trapped miners finally saw their dear loved ones again.

definitions.definition: A planned event at which members of a dispersed group meet together.
examples: Are you going to the high-school reunion this year?

main_definition: The process or act of reuniting.
secondary_definitions: A planned event at which members of a dispersed group meet together.
